question: Which of the following king started the Bahmani expansion towards Berar?
explanation: Taj-ud-din Firoz Shah who ruled the Bahamani kingdom from 1397 CE to 1422 CE was the most remarkable king of Bahamani kingdom. He started the expansion of Bahmani Kingdom towards Berar by defeating the Gond Raja Narsing Rai of Kherla.
